item.title: SABR with the new Hagan PDE Approach
item.description:
At a presentation of the Thalesians, Hagan has presented a new PDE based approach to compute arbitrage free prices under SABR. This is similar in spirit as Andreasen-Huge, but the PDE is directly on the density, not on the prices, and there is no one-step procedure: it’s just like a regular PDE with proper boundary conditions. I was wondering how it compared to Andreasen Huge results.
My first implementation was quite slow. Read More…

item.title: Street Fighting Mathematics Book
item.description:
The MIT has a downloadable book on basic mathematics: Street Fighting Mathematics. I liked the part focused on the geometrical approach. It reminded me of the early greek mathematics. Overall it does look like a very American approach to Maths: answering a multiple choices questions test by elimination. But it is still an interesting book. Read More…
